Question
========

30,000 telephone calls from the ICT department have a distribution with a mean duration of 173.9 seconds and a standard deviation of 184.8 seconds. You take two random samples of 20 and 80 calls, respectively. Which sample has a smaller variability?

Answerlist
----------

* The sample of 20 has smaller variability.
* The sample of 80 has smaller variability.
* Both samples have the same variability.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* The sample of 20 has smaller variability...: Incorrect
* The sample of 80 has a smaller variability...: Correct
* Both samples have the same variability...: Incorrect
